verses.name: Esther 9:11
verses.text: On that day the number of those that were slain in Shushan the palace was brought before the king.

verses.name: Esther 9:12
verses.text: And the king said unto Esther the queen, The Jews have slain and destroyed five hundred men in Shushan the palace, and the ten sons of Haman; what have they done in the rest of the king’s provinces? now what is thy petition? and it shall be granted thee: or what is thy request further? and it shall be done.
